article_title: Hospital Uncompensated Care Rises To $46 Billion Without Obamacare

article_metadata.description: The American Hospital Association said the cost of uncompensated care rose 11.7 percent in 2012 to $45.9 billion. The annual survey of hospitals by their trade group and lobby comes as the Affordable Care Act beings to offer broader health care coverage to millions of Americans. Hospitals were a big supporter [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
